entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitecourt Airport 6:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -20.7°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:09 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:09 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight and ending before morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:09 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
